processingResourceMetaData.name: EmbeddedXmlCasConsumer
processingResourceMetaData.description: CasConsumer that dumps JCas Annotation objects as embedded XML markup.

configurationParameter.name: outputDir
configurationParameter.description: Output directory where embedded XML file will be stored.

configurationParameter.name: includeNamespace
configurationParameter.description: Flag that determines whether the XML element names will include the fully specified TypeName (e.g. includes namespace) or just the last portion of the TypeName.

configurationParameter.name: allowedAnnotations
configurationParameter.description:
Instead of outputting all JCas annotations, this parameter allows only a subset to be included in the result XML document. Each item in the list should be the fully qualified typename of the annotation. The implicit org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.DocumentAnnotation must be included at a bare minimum.
This parameter is optional. If not specified, all JCas annotations will be dumped to the XML doc.
